EmailTemplate.name: MO – Wynn Store Opening
EmailTemplate.subject: RIMOWA celebrates a new store opening in Wynn Palace with an exclusive product launch
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Mr/Mrs {!Contact.LastName},
I hope you are doing well!
I am pleased to let you know that we have a new RIMOWA store in Wynn Palace. To celebrate its opening, the latest Never Still bag designs will be exclusively available there from July 30 - August 11. In addition, you can enjoy a two-day early access to the limited-edition Essential Neon suitcases, which will be available at the Wynn store from Jul 30 – 31 before their official launch.
## I would like to take this opportunity to inform you that I will be working at RIMOWA Wynn Palace from now on. Thank you for shopping with me in XXX Store, and I would be happy to connect you with my colleagues at XXX store should you need anything more. If you are interested in the new collection, I would be delighted to assist you with a product reservation or an appointment at RIMOWA Wynn Palace. You'll find its address below:
Shop 25, Wynn Palace, Avenida da Nave Desportiva, Cotai, Macau
I look forward to seeing you soon,
{!User.Name} RIMOWA {!User.Base_Store_Code__c} Tel:{!User.Mobile} RIMOWA.com
